title: About Factory Plugin
synopsis: The Factory plugin manufactures a new plugin which then replaces the factory. A variety of user interactions trigger the manufacturing of a new plugin.

title: Simon Hilder
synopsis: I grew up in a town called [[Trowbridge]]. It's the best place in the universe.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.
